Title: Increases the number of years of service that a participant in a defined contribution plan or defined benefit plan service award program may receive a contribution
Summary: Increases the number of years of service that a participant in a defined contribution plan service award program or defined benefit plan service award program may receive a contribution from 40 to 50 years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to increasing the number of years of service that a participant in a defined contribution plan service award program or a defined benefit plan service award program may receive a contribution
